summary:
Adds a lore friendly (well lore friendly may be stretching it XDv) Kanshou and Bakuya. Fans of the Fate series will immediately recognize the twin blades as Heroic Spirit Emiya's weapon of choice.

All models and textures made completely from scratch by yours truly /o/

**Includes Left hand models for the Dual Sheath Red
descriptionHtml:
Adds a lore friendly (well, lore friendly may be stretching it a bit XDv) Kanshou and Bakuya. Fans of the Fate series will immediately recognize the twin blades as Heroic Spirit Emiya's weapon of choice.

Requires:
Dawnguard DLC

Both are craftable under Misc in the crafting menu.
Bakuya requires the dragon armor perk to smith.
Kanshou requires Ebony crafting perk to smith

All models and textures made completely from scratch by yours truly~ /o/
this is my first mod, so don't hesitate to tell me if you have suggestions and other stuff XD

**Includes Left hand models for Neovalen's Dual Sheath Redux Mod. Just make sure that the mod is on top of Dual Sheath Redux Patch in the Load order before running the SkyProc patch~

**Added Kanshou without the hexagon glow pattern in the optional files
author: Harmonixer
